name: Chef's Knife
description: A versatile tool used for chopping, slicing, and dicing a variety of ingredients.

name: Cutting Board
description: Provides a safe and durable surface for preparing food with knives or other tools.

name: Measuring Cups
description: Used for accurately measuring dry and liquid ingredients for recipes.

name: Mixing Bowl
description: Ideal for combining ingredients when baking or cooking.

name: Whisk
description: Perfect for blending ingredients smoothly or incorporating air into a mixture.

name: Frying Pan
description: A shallow pan used for frying, searing, and browning foods.

name: Spatula
description: Used to flip or lift food items, especially in a frying pan or griddle.

name: Colander
description: Used for draining water from boiled ingredients such as pasta or vegetables.
